item.description:
A one night trip to the Baldpates shelter on the AT, near Grafton Notch, Maine.

We'll summit the Baldpates either Saturday afternoon after setting up, or Sunday morning before heading home.

We'll stop at Screw Auger Falls and possibly other roadside attractions in Grafton Notch, either Saturday or Sunday. 

A stop at the Sunday River Brewpub is quite possible on the way home on Sunday.

Bring all your own food and gear.  Zero degree sleeping bag and light traction (microspikes or stabilicers) are highly recommended.

For experienced cold-weather backpackers. 

Trip limit is six.  To participate, please put yourself on the established wait list and I'll be in touch.

This event is cross posted with the Maine Outdoor Adventure Club.
item.name: Baldpates Backpack, 10/29-10/30 (trip is full)
